jrd7KE6y7tuvuCniRJ6q"]}},"version":1}

params._implementation: Address of the deployed Escrow implementation

createEscrow(bytes32,address,address,add.details: Uses Clones.clone() which is cheaper than deploying the full contract

params.amountWei: Amount in wei (for BNB) or token decimals (for ERC20)
params.arbiter: Address of the arbiter (use address(0) for no arbiter)
params.deadline: Unix timestamp deadline for the escrow
params.paymentToken: Address of payment token (address(0) for native BNB)

returns.escrow: Address of the newly created escrow clone

createEscrowDeterministic(bytes32,addres.details: Allows predicting the escrow address before deployment

params.amountWei: Amount in wei (for BNB) or token decimals (for ERC20)
params.arbiter: Address of the arbiter (use address(0) for no arbiter)
params.deadline: Unix timestamp deadline for the escrow
params.paymentToken: Address of payment token (address(0) for native BNB)
params.salt: Unique salt for CREATE2 (can be derived from jobId + parties)

returns.escrow: Address of the newly created escrow clone

predictEscrow(bytes32).details: Useful for off-chain address calculation before deployment

params.salt: The salt that will be used for CREATE2

returns.predicted: The predicted address of the escrow clone

setRewardDistributor(address).details: If set, all new escrows will be configured to use this distributor automatically

params._rewardDistributor: Address of the RewardDistributor contract (or address(0) to disable)

setRewardRatePer1e18(uint256).details: GRMPS paid per 1e18 wei of project amount

params._rewardRatePer1e18: Reward rate (e.g., 30000000000000000000000 for 30000 GRMPS per 1 BNB)

setRewardToken(address).details: If set, all new escrows will be configured with this reward token

params._rewardToken: Address of the reward token (or address(0) to disable rewards)

params.newOwner: Address of the new owner (can be a Gnosis Safe multisig)

constructor.notice: Initialize the factory with an implementation contract

createEscrow(bytes32,address,address,add.notice: Create a new non-deterministic escrow clone

createEscrowDeterministic(bytes32,addres.notice: Create a new deterministic escrow clone using CREATE2

implementation().notice: Address of the Escrow implementation contract

isEscrowCreated(address).notice: Mapping to track all escrows created by this factory

owner().notice: Owner of the factory (can be used for future access control)

predictEscrow(bytes32).notice: Predict the address of a deterministic escrow clone

rewardRatePer1e18().notice: Reward rate per 1e18 wei of project amount

setRewardRatePer1e18(uint256).notice: Set the reward rate per 1e18 wei
